name: fx2b's strategy game
description:
You start in a random position on the world. Move around the world, explore the world map and earn money by placing cities, factories, supermarkets, and more!

Keys:
H - City (50 $)
F - Factory (300 $)
S - Supermarket (1500 $)
A - Rename country. Max 43 characters, only letters A-Z, numbers 0-9, and other special characters: , & - ( )  

The screenshots show how you can develop the country.

Guide for fast money: 

1. Place 6 cities.
2. Place a factory.
3. Keep placing cities.
4. When your money speed is fast enough, you can start placing more factories and supermarkets.

On the APK version, I forgot to add a change name button, maybe in the next update I'll fix it.
